title: After finished game it asks 2 reconnect but i can't
body:
after i finished my game it took over 2 minutes to wait for my stats so i decided to skip them then the game asks me to reconnect which is impossible since we have already finished
anyway i cant start a new game because the client is stuck in the last one 

Please help ^^

replies.body:
That is known as a "spooky ghost game". It's a server side issue, which you cannot fix yourself. The only option is to just wait until the server closes the game.

Also, the server will put a leave-marker on your account for your troubles. Riot's kind like that.
